mapper.select: select * from notice where n_title like '%'||#{n_title}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into notice (n_code, n_name, n_title, n_cnt, n_content, n_regdate) values (#{n_code}, #{n_name}, #{n_title}, #{n_cnt}, #{n_content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update notice set n_title = #{n_title}, n_content = #{n_content} where n_code = #{n_code}
update notice set n_cnt = n_cnt + 1 where n_code = #{n_code}
